About:
Reclusive neurobiologist Dr. David Styles conducts all of his research from his home, the Dread Hill House. His new assistant, Samantha, suspects that the doctorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s experiments are not as innocent as they appear. What is Dr. StylesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ true aim?
